resources.string: Use the back button on your device to return to the main menu.
This game mode is still in development.\nLook forward to it in the near future!

ColouRing is a simple yet addicting game to play.

Let's get started!


 TO PROCEED -->
The objective of ColouRing is to form the best possible colour gradient from the inner circle to the outer ring.
In order to select a colour, tap on one of the four sections of each ring. The other sections of that ring will be grayed out.
Continue to work your way out of the circle. Keep in mind that the selected path must be connected between rings.
If you have chosen an incorrect path, you will not proceed. The path can be deselected by tapping in each ring again.
If you have chosen the correct path, you will proceed to the next round. Complete all 10 rounds as fast as you can!

We, the developers from Focus Studios, thank you for downloading and hope you enjoyed playing our game!

 If you have any problems or suggestions for the game, please email them to
focusstudiosgames@gmail.com.

 Team:
 Lead Algorithm Developer: Kelvin Jiang
 Lead GUI Designer: Patrick Zhang

 Special thanks to Angelina Jin for the app icon design!
